greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of ways to write 2*n as an ordered sum of n squares of positive integers.
comment: Also number of ways to write n as an ordered sum of n nonnegative numbers one less than a square.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..2000
formula: a(n) = [x^(2*n)] ((theta_3(x) - 1) / 2)^n, where theta_3() is the Jacobi theta function.
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Jan 31 2021
